marble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a type of hard rock that becomes smooth when it is polished, and is used for making buildings, statues etc
marble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The columns were of white marble.
marble.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a small coloured glass ball that children roll along the ground as part of a game
marble.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a statue or sculpture made of marble
